content: Follow-up single?! Who do you think we are, some two-bit hacks who will keep writing you songs simply because you pay us obscene amounts of cash? Phineas and the Ferb-Tones are strictly a one-hit wonder. Good day to you, sir. Diva tantrum, check. Elevator music, check.
author: Dan Povenmire, Jeff "Swampy" Marsh
